record.title: COMPREHENSIVE IMMIGRATION REFORM ACT OF 2007--Continued

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, on behalf of Senators Kennedy and Specter, I call up an amendment that is now at the desk.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the reading of the amendment be dispensed with.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
